org.ggp.base.util.game

Class GameRepository

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.ggp.base.util.game.GameRepository
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    CloudGameRepository, LocalGameRepository, RemoteGameRepository, TestGameRepository

    public abstract class GameRepository
extends java.lang.Object
    Game repositories contain games, and provide two main services: you can query a repository to get a list of available games (by key), and given a key, you can look up the associated Game object. All queries to a game repository are cached, and the caching is handled in this abstract base class. Concrete subclasses will implement the actual behavior required for fetching games from the underlying repositories.
    Author:
    Sam
